text: Her Father's Son is a 1916 American Civil War comedy movie directed by William Desmond Taylor and starring Vivian Martin, Gayne Whitman, Herbert Standing, Helen Jerome Eddy, Lucille Ward. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1916 movies Category:1910s war movies Category:1910s comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:American war movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by William Desmond Taylor
title: Her Father's Son
